Performer and Scholar Collections at Special Collections in Performing Arts

An overview of collections of papers of performers and scholars at Special Collections in Performing Arts at the University of Maryland.
  • Guide Overview
  • Performer Collections
  • Scholar Collections
  • Organizational Archives

Contact the Curator

If you would like more information about any of the collections featured here, please contact 

Vincent Novara

Curator for Special Collections in Performing Arts (SCPA)

vnovara@umd.edu

301.405.9220

  • Contact the Curator

About the Special Collections in Performing Arts

Special Collections in Performing Arts (SCPA) at the Michelle Smith Performing Arts Library of the University of Maryland Libraries contains performing arts collections that preserve performance, education, recordings, and scholarship.
